all wekeend? I haven't seen you in forever!
haha ok, you've convinced me.
brunch?
sorry, just woke up. still up for brunch?

message: what are you up to this week...

messages.message: hey what's up? here's my number
hey! awesome. how's it going?
good. soooo bored. I'm in class right now

new media with dr. harris. literally going to die
lol
so what are you up to this weekend?

lastMessage: not sure yet, what are you doing?

name: Dr. Cheese
message: Make sure to sign up for the...

messages.message: Hi, Dr. Weatherby, I was wondering if you wanted to meet for lunch tomorrow
Also, thank you for all the advice yesterday on my course load
Of course, and absolutely for lunch. I am free at 12, just swing by my office
Perfect! see you then!
What are some research topics I should research for the upcoming seminar?
I would say focus on American history from 1800 to 1830. The library has a great selection on the First Seminole War
Thank you!
Make sure to sign up for the lecture on Calvin Coolidge. It's going to be great!
howdy
what's up?
not too much, just chillin with eleanor
is she okay? what's going on with her lately?
she's just going through a rough time right now, I can't talk much about it
i get it. tell her if she needs anything to let me know, okay? is it her parnts?
can't talk about it. how are classes?
not too bad. summer semester is always really slow. not too worried yet.
haha, right? this college is so freaking easy
yeah, I know what you're going to say - nothing compared ot harvard, right?
hey, I should have gotten in
I'm going to kill my parents. They're being completely unreasonable
aw, what's wrong?
Nothing. They're just dumb. I'm taking a ton of classes and they have no sympathy for me
yeah that's stupid. are you okay?
Of course. It's just really frustrating. I just have no idea what i'm doing and i feel stupid for caring
it's totally fine to care, or you know, not care. want to come with us for brunch at the dynamo donkey?
Tomorrow?
yep, eleven o'clock sharp
Yes, totally. I need a break from thinking about this
awesome. just try to do something fun tonight
Yep, got netflix going right now
haha awesome
